query:
SELECT 
  'Total de Clientes' as metrica,
  COUNT(*) as valor,
  '100%' as percentual
FROM clientes

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Com Nome',
  COUNT(*),
  CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes), 2), '%')
FROM clientes
WHERE nome IS NOT NULL AND nome != ''

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Com CNPJ',
  COUNT(*),
  CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes), 2), '%')
FROM clientes
WHERE cnpj IS NOT NULL AND cnpj != ''

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Com Email',
  COUNT(*),
  CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes), 2), '%')
FROM clientes
WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND email != ''

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Com Telefone',
  COUNT(*),
  CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes), 2), '%')
FROM clientes
WHERE telefone IS NOT NULL AND telefone != ''

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Com Site Oficial',
  COUNT(*),
  CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes), 2), '%')
FROM clientes
WHERE siteOficial IS NOT NULL AND siteOficial != ''

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Com Cidade',
  COUNT(*),
  CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes), 2), '%')
FROM clientes
WHERE cidade IS NOT NULL AND cidade != ''

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Com UF',
  COUNT(*),
  CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes), 2), '%')
FROM clientes
WHERE uf IS NOT NULL AND uf != ''

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Com Produto Principal',
  COUNT(*),
  CONCAT(ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes), 2), '%')
FROM clientes
WHERE produtoPrincipal IS NOT NULL AND produtoPrincipal != '';
